body.name: BOLOXA Bluetooth Headphones 5.3 Wireless Earbuds IPX7 Waterproof & 16Hrs Long Battery Over-Ear Stereo Bass Earphones with Earhooks Running Headset with Mic & Storage Bag for Workout Gym Sports
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 13 hrs 58 mins
features: 【Comfort & Secure Fit】Adopted ergonomic and lightweight design, U8I Bluetooth sport earphones enhance your wearing experience. The flexible & adjustable ear hooks ensure running headset stay put and never fall out. You can choose the most snug fit among 3 pairs of soft and different sized ear tips. They make you relaxed even intense exercise for a long time.

【Long-Lasting Battery Life】Built-in 100mAh capacity battery on Bluetooth headset, it provides seamless enjoyment of music for up to 16 hours. And only charging 1.5 hours, it gets 100H Standby time of superior audio performance & call time. Besides, you can check the remaining battery power of the headphones on your Phone screen.(Note: Please use the charging cable provided on the package)

【Premium Hi-Fi Music & Clear Call】Powered by 13mm high-fidelity driver and in-ear acoustic structure, wired headphones with microphones produce incredible sound quality with deep bass and crystal clear treble. The microphone inside each earbud for phone calls, ensures that you can hear the caller and the caller can hear you clearly. Designed for business and commuting.

【Hassle-free Button Control】You can easily skip track/adjust volume/activate voice assistant through the button control. No any skill required, even old grandpa can use flawlessly. Free your hands when doing exercise, these snug earphones Bluetooth are especially made for jogging/hiking/fitness/biking etc.

【IPX7 Waterproof Rating】High-rated IPX7 waterproof provides effectively protection from sweat/light rain/accident splashes effectively. So casually immerse yourself in the music thanks to our U8I workout headphones, even during vigorous exercise and all-weather conditions.

【Easy to Use and Wide Compatibility】Benefit from advanced Bluetooth 5.3 technology, these mini stereo headset will reconnected with the ex-paired device once they power on. Besides, it works well with most Bluetooth-enabled device including iOS and Android smart phones, Laptops, Tablets, Audio books, TV, Watches, Computers, MP3, MP4 and etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How Bluetooth Sport BOLOXA U8I Headphones Stand Out? Our U8I exercise headset with flexible ear hook and soft earpieces, is born for sports lovers. Freely enjoy fantastic clear music during your daily workout. More stable connection and wider compatibility since we utilize latest Bluetooth 5.3 chip.

Flexible Earhook Design & Custom Earplugs For Exercise *Adjustable over-ear hooks can decrease pressure of your ear canal, giving a comfortable listening experience. *Combined with 3 pairs of different sizes earcaps(S, M, L), they will let these earbuds to stay stable on your ears. So you don’t need to constantly readjust during strenuous workout. Tips: Please choose the best suitable, which makes a big difference for ultra-comfort and premium sound quality.

Ultra-long Playtime During Workout, Play Games, Office, Casual Charging through the included charging cable for 1.5 hours-2 hours, the headset can work for you for 15-16 hours. This fully meets your daily music or video needs, you can wear it anytime for running, yoga, hiking and more. The extra 100 hours of standby time will allow you to recharge your batteries without worrying about running low. Note: >Check the battery level of earbuds directly on the top right corner of your device or on the setting interface whenever and wherever. >Battery life will vary according to the frequency of use and the way it is used, please use your headphones properly. And there will be the low battery voice notification will remind you.

Free your hands, Individual Volume Buttons, Convenient! *This headset uses button control, which is much more convenient than those annoying and insensitive touch headsets. *In addition, it has a multi-function button, as well as a dedicated volume button to adjust the volume and switch songs. Super easy operation and convenience!

Immersive Yourself into Music, Focus on What You Will Hear! [HD Stereo Audio] U8I audio earphones provide powerful bass, mellow mid-range, and clear treble. [Crisp Voice Calls] Excellent microphones capture your clear voice for transmission to the listener,your sound will be heard clearly and loudly. [IPX7 Waterproof] The inside nano coating prevents moisture in the air from destroying the parts, ideal for sweating at the gym or walking in rain.

Work well with most Bluetooth-enabled devices, Bluetooth 5.3 technology >Equipped with advanced Bluetooth 5.3 chip set, these running earphones bluetooth has strong and stable transmission whether you are watching a movie or listening to music. >Our U8I audio earbuds are widely compatible with most android smart phone and iOS system product(including iP 14/13/12/11/X/8/7 series, iPad, Apple Watch, Mac Book etc.), and smart TV/computer/Laptop and so on.

The Best Choice of Gifts At Christmas and New Year [Lightweight and Comes with a Storage Bag] The whole set of headphones is only 0.35oz! You can put your headphones in the included carrying bag and enjoy it on the go. [Rich Package Content] What you'll get is not just a pair of sports earphones, but these: a charging cable, a storage bag, 3 pairs of earcusionl, and an instruction booklet. [Unique and Stylish Presents] Perfect for Thanksgiving Day/Christmas Day/Happy New Year's Gift, and birthday gift for family members and friends. [Use in multiple scenarios] Made for safe driving/running/working/relax/business and so on. >>>>>FAQ<<<<< When should I reset? >Only one earbud plays music. >Both headphones can not work with together. >Occur connection issues. How to reset? >Turn off the headphones first. >It is recommended to wear the left headphone on the ear to listen to the prompt sound, and the right headphone is used to observe the indicator light. >In the state of shutdown,press and hold the MFB button for 10s. (You will hear the "power on" sound first and then hear the "pairing" sound; keep holding the MFB button and then you hear 3 tones; the headphones are off.) >If not,please repeat the steps above.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These earbuds are excellent, the best I’ve had (& I’ve had a lot!). They are more secure in my ear, are more comfortable, offer wholly sufficient volume, operate when full more than 12 hrs , & reload quickly. I think they are terrific! I’ve also had occasion to interact with Customer Service which proved more satisfying than any other similar experience. If you need new bids, try these; They are also comfortably priced. Check it out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Headset For Exercise...
reviews.reviewText: These are absolutely great!!1. Sound- Excellent and clear, pretty loud, not noice cancelling but you don't need that in the gym.2. Fit- Great, stays in my ear and doesn't fall out, no matter how much I run, bounce or jump3.Connectivity- Excellent with a great Bluetooth bandwidthBattery Life- Excellent, I workout for an average 90 mins, 4 days a week and only have to charge at the end of the weekMic- Great! I'm really surprised. Usually we have to sacrifice the mic with these types of headsets, not with this...it works great.Controls- One of the best feature about this headset is that it uses buttons, not touch...I can easily turn on/off, turn up the volume and rewind....Would give this more starts if I could.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: At 68 I got back into a gym. I love old time rock and roll but didn’t want headphones as most seem to use. Too bulky, uncomfortable and make me sweat more under them. Ear pods normally haven’t stayed in for me. I seen these and thought they were the ones to do the job, and they didn’t let me down. They were reasonably priced. Setup was a breeze and man they are comfortable! They stayed put and the music sounded great. I love them!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality for price
reviews.reviewText: This is my 3rd or so pair of these. (Lost or broke them) For the price they are so great. Last a while, I’m guessing around 8-11 hours (mine have ) of constant use.My only complaint is the warranty. I’ve tried to warranty one pair and I couldn’t get ahold of them. Amazon made it right (above and beyond) tho the product itself is great. Great mic. Great sound.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: For the price, these a a pretty good earbud for what I wanted. They fit fairly well but do not adjust. Sound quality is good, battery lasts quite awhile. Easy to operate, able to connect to my android phone, however, not working with my ipod. It connects, is recognized but no sound comes through, disappointing as I wanted for use on flights. For the price, I'm keeping and will use anyway.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I used for the first time. Very clear and simple instructions to set up and use. Phone works great. Clear connection. Great headphone for the money. Looking forward to using them on the trail.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nothing Special but does the job
reviews.reviewText: I’m not a headphone snob so as long as they sound decent I’ll wear them.I had a pair like this before same style and look just a different brand and they were lost. But were great on quality and sound was goodI got these as a replacement and it’s the same, Good Sound and so far good quality! It comes in a nice carry case with extra ear buds/sizes. Connecting was super simple and easy with no troubleI’d however like to see USB-C for the charger but they are using the old style, no biggie but I understand that the price would more than likely increase so it’s a win lose situation.I’d definitely buy these again if they break or are lost again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Damn! What a great product at a great price.
reviews.reviewText: I've bought numerous buds over the past two years trying to find the right ones. I've spent over $200 and very cheap. Out of all of them these are the best. Great fit, good sound, and good battery. Only thing it doesn't have is ANC.
Los he estado usando y hasta hoy funciona bien, no se siente mucha calidad cualquier descuido y se ven frágiles. El audio no es HiFi no de broma, para el precio esperaría más.
